response.overview: Jerónimo is a former santero that has left his country trying to escape a work history linked to drug trafficking crimes. Despite of the distance and the passage of time, Jerónimo is tormented by the bloody episodes of his past. One day, someone knocks on his door and a strange proposal alters his exile: do one last work of santería and have the possibility to redeem himself, or refuse and reveal his whereabouts.
response.title: Santo
